entry.title: The First Gloss
entry.summary:
And so I start….

Take hold of the shaft of the pen.
Subscribe to the first step taken
from a justified line
into the margin.

Seamus Heaney - The First Gloss

Not as a medieval monk annotating a religious text (anyone who knows me would cry foul if I claimed that), but as someone seeking to add a notes in the margins of the Internet.

In the hope that others may find and use them.
